clues.text: These "drenched" fats are usually solid at room temperature & a diet high in them can raise cholesterol

This verb can be defined as extinguishing a flame or dipping someone in water
This word for totally submerged has a huge body of water in the middle of it

Seismic waves suddenly change speed in the D'' layer, the lowest 150 miles of this, just above the core

In a 17th century classic, he tells the title character, "What we see there are not giants but windmills"

rounds.comments: (Ken: For example, Asia might link up with Africa for Chinamibia.)

rounds.text: A 1976 report initiated by Admiral Rickover found it was an internal, not external, explosion that caused the destruction of this
